mapper.delete: delete place, place_detail, place_img FROM place JOIN place_detail USING (place_num) JOIN place_img USING (place_num) WHERE place_num = #{placeNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM place INNER JOIN member ON place.user_id = member.user_id WHERE member.user_id=#{userId} AND place.place_num=#{placeNum};
